name: Prestidigitaxation (LD50)
description:
The kingdom has placed a tax on the casting of magical spells and now you're in a heap of debt! The tax collectors are coming and it's up to you to delay the inevitable by avoiding paying your past due taxes for as long as possible!

CONTROLS

* E to Use Items and Shop

* Shift to Dodge

* Left Click to Fire

* Enter to Pause

CREDITS

* Programmed by Herchey and TomatoLamp

* Art by TomatoLamp

* Music by GibberingTaylor

A couple effects were made with All-in-1 VFX for Unity and left unchanged due to time constraints


-----------------------------------------------------------

Made for Ludum Dare 50: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/50/prestidigitaxation-ld50
